summary.span: 表示 对象的集合，并用于存放 控件和 控件的项。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects, and is used to hold the items of a control and a control.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问 控件的属性 或控件的属性将 检索 对象。Accessing the property of a control or the property of a control retrieves a object. 您可以在运行时在集合中添加或移除项。You can add or remove items from the collection at run time. 对象继承自 接口。A object inherits from the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过类操作对象中的项 。The following code example shows how you manipulate items in the object through the class. 此代码使用选定项的索引到 属性。The code uses the selected item's index into the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据所使用的语法， 方法会将指定的项添加到集合的末尾，或用指定的文本构造一个新的列表项，然后将其添加到集合的末尾。Depending on the syntax used, the method either adds the specified item to the end of the collection, or constructs a new list item with the specified text and then adds it to the end of the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将名为的项添加 `_ml` 到的末尾 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add an item named `_ml` to the end of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在只读界面中不可用 。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 对于应用此方法的所有类，可以使用方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，集合的 方法 会清除集合中的所有样式; 对于 ，它会清除集合中的所有选择。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到对象列表的字段会更改控件的数据绑定行为，并要求您再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index`该值必须介于0和集合大小之间。The `index` value must be between 0 and the size of the collection. 如果 `index` 是集合的大小， `item` 则将添加到集合的末尾。If `index` is the size of the collection, `item` is added to the end of the collection. 此重载首先 使用给定的字符串创建一个新的对象，并插入此项。This overload first creates a new object with the given string, and inserts this item.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法后， 属性将返回 `true` 。After this method has been called, the property will return `true`. 此外， 中的对象的属性 将设置为 `true` 。Also, the property of the objects in the will be set to `true`.
